drinks.name: Dirty Martini
drinks.description: a cocktail made with gin or vodka, dry vermouth, and olive brine, giving it a salty twist.
drinks.recipe: 2 1/2 ounces gin or vodka,1/2 ounce dry vermouth, 1/2 ounce olive brine, Green olives for garnish

drinks.name: Manhattan
drinks.description: classic cocktail made with whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters. It's typically served in a cocktail glass with a cherry garnish.
drinks.recipe: 2 oz bourbon or rye whiskey, 1 oz sweet vermouth, 2 dashes Angostura bitters, Maraschino cherry or orange twist for garnish

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan
drinks.description: a popular cocktail made with vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and a splash of lime juice. It's typically served in a martini glass and garnished with a twist of lime. The drink is known for its vibrant pink color and refreshing taste, with a perfect balance of sweetness and tartness.
drinks.recipe: 1 1/4 oz Vodka, 3/4oz triple sec, 3oz red cranberry juice, 1/2 lime, 1 orange twist

drinks.name: Old Fashion
drinks.description: a classic whiskey cocktail made with sugar, bitters, whiskey, and a citrus twist.
drinks.recipe: 1 orange slice, 2 maraschino cherries, 2oz bourbon, 1/2oz simple syrup, 3 dashes bitters, 1 orange twist, 1 cherry flag

drinks.name: Negroni
drinks.description: a cocktail made with equal parts gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth, served over ice with an orange garnish.
drinks.recipe: 1oz Campari, 1oz sweet red vermouth, 1oz gin, 1 orange peel spiral

snacks.name: Birria Short Rib
snacks.description: 12oz bone-in, colombian arepa, queso oaxaca, napales

snacks.name: Duck Breast
snacks.description: parsnip, foie gras, duck confit squash blossom, black truffle sofrito

snacks.name: 10oz Westholme Wagyu Striploin
snacks.description: Smokey merken spice, tomato beef jus, trumpet mushroom carpaccio, pomme souffle

snacks.name: Kale And Lime Salad (Ve)
snacks.description: endive, arugula, green apple, cranberries, pumpkin seed, cancha corn, lime vinaigrette
